column4: Hey, kind  of OT, but has anyone ever had success training spamassassin to reject those 'gibberish' mails, you know the ones that ook like real email but it's just a bunch of non-related words?
can gnomebaker really remaster the AVI into vobs? I never knew that
I really like to look of the Qt widgets but I dont care for how KDE tries to be like windows
